name: Page Post Details Widget
author: Ashirbad Ray

sections.description:
Easily display your WordPress Pages and Posts Details and also displays the comments details on frontend of your wordpress website.

Page Post Details Widget

*Easily display your WordPress Pages and Posts Details and also displays the comments details on frontend of your wordpress website.

This plugin helps you add pages and posts and comments status to your wordpress Website .
sections.installation:
Installing the plugin

  1. In your WordPress admin panel, go to Plugins > New Plugin, search for Page Post Details Widget and click “Install now“
  2. Alternatively, download the plugin and upload the contents of page-post-details.zip to your plugins directory, which usually is `/wp-content/plugins/.
  3. Activate the plugin.
  4. Set users list widget to the sidebar/footer widget.

Configuring Page Post Details Widget

  1. Go to *Page Post Details Widget Widget In Apperance->widget -> Sidebar/Footer Widget Section 2.Change the Widget Name For displaying in the website.
sections.faq:
Where can I find Page Post Details Widget ?

Go to Appearance > Widgets and use the Page Post Details Widget ** widget that comes with the plugin.

How to display a form in widget areas like the sidebar or footer?

1.Go to Appearance > Widgets and use the Page Post Details Widget ** widget that comes with the plugin. 2. Go to *Page Post Details Widget Widget In Apperance->widget -> Sidebar/Footer Widget Section
